data.name: Idler Coaster
data.detailed_description:
Idler Coaster is an incremental idle management game that give you true freedom over your build orders and your strategies.

Build and upgrades rides, take care of your guests and manage budget sheets like a true capitalist to become the #1 amusement park corporation in the world!

Do you like clickers games but wish you had more control on what you build?

In Idler Coaster, every ride is a money generator. You can build the ride you want, where you want!
data.about_the_game:
Idler Coaster is an incremental idle management game that give you true freedom over your build orders and your strategies.

Build and upgrades rides, take care of your guests and manage budget sheets like a true capitalist to become the #1 amusement park corporation in the world!

Do you like clickers games but wish you had more control on what you build?

In Idler Coaster, every ride is a money generator. You can build the ride you want, where you want!
data.short_description: Build the ride you want, where you want! Customize your park, upgrade rides and research new attractions to turn your guests into happy customers! Sit back and count your money or click your way to the top!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: 200 Mhz Pentium processor or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support minimum of Direct3D 9
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum of 960x540 display support
